Making RA Radically Awesome

Following my own yellow brick road to the rainbows edge. My journey begins as I attempt to simply place one foot in front of the other and become a nomad of my own journey. As Toa so elequently puts it "a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step". As I traverse the highs and lows of my RA journey my updates will always be about ...nobody but me.....so in essence this is about me inspiring myself to find a way to the rainbows edge. and so it begins
